item.title: Biopsychosocial Factors
item.description: This concept refers to the interconnection between biology, psychology, and socio-environmental factors. These factors play a significant role in understanding health and wellness 1. Here’s a breakdown of each component: Biological Factors: These include physiological factors such as genetics and illness pathology 1. Our physical well-being impacts our mental health for multiple reasons. For example, chronic pain can lead to symptoms of depression 1. Psychological Factors: This involves thoughts, emotions, and behavior 1.
